TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonButton implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示自定义功能区上的按钮。

span.span: Represents a button on a custom Ribbon.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 将 "**按钮**" 控件从 "**工具箱**" 的 " **Office 功能区控件**" 选项卡拖动到功能区设计器上时, Visual Studio 将创建实现接口的类的实例。Visual Studio creates an instance of a class that implements the interface when you drag a **Button** control from the **Office Ribbon Controls** tab of the **Toolbox** onto the Ribbon Designer. 你还可以在运行时创建此控件的实例, 并将其添加到动态菜单。You can also create an instance of this control at run time and add it to a dynamic menu. 如果将其属性设置为, `true`则菜单为动态菜单。A menu is dynamic if you set its property to `true`. 只能在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序之前或在运行时将控件添加到动态菜单之前设置此控件的某些属性。Some properties of this control can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application or before the control is added to a dynamic menu at run time. 有关设置这些属性的信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 您可以通过使用 对象的方法在运行时创建。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. ## 常规任务Common Tasks 下表列出了可用于常见任务的成员。The following table lists members that are useful for common tasks. |任务Task|成员Member| |----------|------------| |在运行时, 向菜单添加一个按钮, 该按钮的属性设置为 true。At run time, add a button to a menu that has its property set to true.|使用创建实现接口的类的实例。Create an instance of a class that implements the interface by using the

类的方法。method of the class. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[对 Office 项目中对象的全局访问](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects)。For more information, see [Global Access to Objects in Office Projects](/visualstudio/vsto/global-access-to-objects-in-office-projects).

将实例添加到菜单的`Items`集合中。Add the instance to the menu's `Items` collection.| |更改按钮的大小。Change the size of the button.|设置为所需的值。Set to the value you want. 例如, 对于大按钮, 将其设置为`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`。For example, for a large button, set it to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`.| |在按钮上显示图像。Display an image on the button.|可以通过三种方式显示图像:There are three ways to display an image:

-使用属性。- Use the property. 此属性可提供最大程度的控制。This property gives the most control.
-设置为要显示为按钮图标的内置 Microsoft Office 映像的 ID。- Set to the ID of a built-in Microsoft Office image that you want to display as the icon for the button.
-将属性与事件一起使用。- Use the property along with the event. 此属性提供了一些性能优势。This property gives some performance benefits.| |禁用或隐藏按钮。Disable or hide buttons.|若要禁用按钮, 请将`false`设置为。To disable a button, set to `false`.

若要隐藏按钮, 请将`false`设置为。To hide a button, set to `false`.| |用户单击按钮时运行代码。Run code when a user clicks the button.|将代码添加到事件处理程序。Add code to the event handler.| [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新按钮, 设置该按钮的各种属性, 然后将该按钮添加到菜单中。The following example creates a new button, sets various properties of the button, and then adds the button to a menu. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将菜单添加到组。Add a menu to the group. 4. 将菜单的**动态**属性设置为`true`。Set the **Dynamic** property of the menu to `true`. 5. 将菜单的**ItemSize**属性设置为**RibbonControlSizeLarge**。Set the **ItemSize** property of the menu to **RibbonControlSizeLarge**. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#9](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#9](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 在用户单击按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the button.

summary.span: 获取或设置按钮的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of the button.

value.span: 一个RibbonControlSize , 它表示按钮的大小。

span.span: A Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize that represents the size of the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果按钮是菜单的一部分, 则此属性不起作用。This property has no effect if the button is part of a menu. 作为菜单的一部分的按钮始终显示为, 因为其属性已设置为父菜单的属性的值。A button that is part of a menu is always displayed as if its property were set to the value of the parent menu's property. 若要使按钮在菜单上显示得更大 , 请将的`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`属性设置为。To make buttons appear larger on a menu, set the property of the to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`. ## Examples 下面的示例使按钮显示得更大。The following example makes a button appear larger. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组中添加一个按钮。Add a button to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在将菜单的 属性设置为 Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge 时菜单中此按钮上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this button in a menu when the property of the menu is set to Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge.

value.span: 当此控件嵌套在另一个菜单或拆分按钮中, 并且父菜单的属性或拆分按钮的属性设置为时, 将显示说明。RibbonControlSize. RibbonControlSizeLarge。

span.span: The description appears when this control is nested in another menu or split button, and the property of the parent menu, or the property of the split button, is set to Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge.

value.span: 可以在运行时更改此属性。

span.span: This property can be changed at run time.

summary.span: 获取或设置在按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on the button.
An that is displayed on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式为 PNG, 因为 PNG 格式的图像通过其 alpha 通道支持透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 如果设置了 属性, 则将忽略和属性。 If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性比其他两个属性提供的控件更多, 但它可能会变慢, 因为每次更新控件时, 都会将 image 对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例设置两个按钮的属性。The following example sets the property of two buttons. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将两个按钮添加到组。Add two buttons to the group. 4. 将两个图像添加到项目资源。Add two images to the project resources. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#5](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#5](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use to identify the button in the event handler.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识按钮。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 有关设置此属性的信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序仅从解决方案中检索一次此映像, 以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 只能在设计时设置此属性, 因为该属性标识的图像将在事件中加载。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 当显示功能区时, 每个映像名称只引发一次。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后, 不能使用此属性更改控制图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像, 请将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性,并将对象的属性设置为要加载的图像。 Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果设置了属性或属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 与属性标识的图像相比, 属性所标识的映像的加载速度要快得多, 因为 Office 应用程序只会在首次显示功能区时从你的解决方案中检索该图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例为两个按钮缓存图像。The following example caches the images for two buttons. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 将两个按钮添加到组。Add two buttons to the group. 4. 将两个图像添加到项目资源。Add two images to the project resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：添加或删除资源](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d)。For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Resources](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7b77bc06-3952-4799-b029-def3f8f7f88d). 然后, 你可以在生成的功能区类中运行此代码。You can then run this code in the generated Ribbon class. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#6](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置按钮的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut of the button.

value.span: 一个表示该按钮的键盘快捷键的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the keyboard shortcut of the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须为1到3个大写字符, 不能包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器", 用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时, 功能区上将显示键提示。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果 KeyTip 与内置控件或其他外接程序的 keytip 发生冲突, Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配不冲突的 KeyTip 值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523). ## Examples 下面的示例将 KeyTip 分配给按钮和复选框。The following example assigns a KeyTip to a button and a check box. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组添加一个按钮和一个复选框。Add a button and a check box to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#7](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/CS/Ribbon1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel#7](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ObjectModel/VB/Ribbon1.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在按钮上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed on the button.

value.span: 一个表示该按钮上显示的文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the text that is displayed on the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要隐藏标签, 请将`false`设置为。To hide the label, set to `false`.

summary.span: 如果想使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置在按钮上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the button, if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是标识`imageMso`所选图标的值的字符串。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关`imageMso`值的列表, 请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序:图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果设置了属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if the property is set. 由于图像缓存在 Office 应用程序中, 因此可以比属性标识的图像稍快地加载属性标识的图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例为按钮指定 Microsoft Office 图标。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office icon to a button. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向使用 Visual Studio 中的 Office 开发工具创建的项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to a project created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组中添加一个按钮。Add a button to the group. 4. 将按钮的 " **(Name)** " 属性设置`mySaveButton`为。Set the **(Name)** property of the button to `mySaveButton`. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#1](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#1](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 如果按钮位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上，请获取或设置该按钮的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position of the button, if the button is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

value.span: 一个 ，表示 的位置（如果该控件位于 Microsoft Office 菜单上）。

span.span: A that represents the position of the , if the control is on the Microsoft Office Menu.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 将按钮放入功能区上的组中时, 属性不起作用。The property has no effect when the button is placed in a group on the Ribbon. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：向 Backstage 视图](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view)添加控件。For more information, see [How to: Add Controls to the Backstage View](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-controls-to-the-backstage-view).

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到按钮上方时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.

value.span: 当用户将指针移到按钮上方时显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: The tooltip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屏幕提示值的长度必须小于1024个字符。The ScreenTip value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 设置属性时 , 值显示为的标题。 When the property is set, the value appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与按钮关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the button is visible.

value.span: 如果与按钮关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the button is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在功能区设计器`true`中设置、或属性, 则此属性将自动设置为。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property in the Ribbon Designer. 您可以将其设置`false`为, 以使与此控件关联的图像处于隐藏状态。You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden. 在运行 时设置、或属性不会更改属性的值。Setting the , , or property at run time does not change the value of the property. 此属性对快速访问工具栏上显示的此按钮的实例无效。This property has no effect for instances of this button that are displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar. 如果将`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge` 属性设置为, 则按钮的行为方式如下: 始终`true`为。 If the property is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`, the button behaves as if is always `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示按钮的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for the button is visible.

value.span: 如果按钮的标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label for the button is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将`Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge` 属性设置为, 则按钮的行为方式如下: 始终`true`为。 If the property is set to `Microsoft.Office.Core.RibbonControlSize.RibbonControlSizeLarge`, the button behaves as if is always `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户将指针移到按钮上方时显示的多行提示文本。

value.span: 一个包含当用户将指针移到按钮上时显示的多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串的长度必须小于1024个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 显示在 " 文本" 下。The appears under text. 与不同的是 , 会在字符串中启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.
